query.title: Query
query.description: Provide a MongoDB-like query using JSON

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Limit how many items to get. If it's not provided, will return all found items

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Will slice the data from the provided offset. Can be used with 'Limit'. Defaults to 0

filterMap.title: Map and filter function
filterMap.description: Provide a map function, allows you to return modified data. Returning null or undefined don't output the item

customOperationSetup.title: Custom operations setup
customOperationSetup.description: Setup custom operations for usage on queries
